daily_take.headline: Iran Strike Odds Hit 2-to-1 as Middle East Tensions Spike Again
daily_take.deck: The prediction market for US military action against Iran jumped 6 points overnight to 63.5%, signaling traders are pricing in a genuine escalation risk over the next 14 months. The $15.3M in volume suggests serious money is taking this seriously. Something shifted in geopolitical calculus today, and the market felt it before the headlines caught up.
